title: Out of a Chinese painting brush (TEFC)
brief_description: Produced by the Harmon Foundation in cooperation with the China Institute in America, this film shows us a famous Chinese artist, Chang Shu-Chi at work with a paint-brush. Photographed at actual speed, the film reveals the speed and grace of his technique.
